title: TPD: Woman accidentally shot herself outside Park Place Mall
content:
TUCSON, AZ (Tucson News Now) -
A woman accidentally shot herself late Friday night outside of the Macy's at Park Place Mall, authorities said.
Sgt. Kim Bay, spokeswoman with the Tucson Police Department, said the mall was not locked down.
The shooting happened around 10 p.m.
BREAKING: @Tucson_Police says a woman accidentally shot herself outside of Macy's at Park Place Mall. pic.twitter.com/W8bYMxshuG
— Monica Grimaldo (@monicagrimaldo_) November 26, 2016
